full_summary:
### Request for Proposal

#### Title
Need for Cleaning, Gardening, and Handyman Personnel at the Canadian Embassy in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, in Kinshasa

#### Reference Number
cb-4667-43769626

#### Solicitation Number
22-194558

#### Publication Date
2023-04-06

#### Tender Closing Date
2023-05-09T14:00:00

#### Expected Contract Start Date
2023-06-01

#### Expected Contract End Date
2023-05-31

The Canadian Embassy in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, in Kinshasa, is seeking qualified service providers for the provision of cleaning, gardening, and handyman services for their properties in Kinshasa. The successful bidder will be responsible for maintaining the cleanliness and appearance of the Embassy's facilities, including the Chancellery, in accordance with industry standards.

Key services to be provided include:
* Cleaning and janitorial services
* Gardening and grounds maintenance
* Handyman services (plumbing, electricity, carpentry, masonry, etc.)

The Embassy's Chancellery is located at 17, Pumbu Ave, Municipality of Gombe, Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo. The successful bidder will be required to provide services for the Embassy's facilities, including the Chancellery.

### Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation criteria for this Request for Proposal are based on the following factors:
* Technical capabilities (40%)
* Past experience and reputation (30%)
* Financial capacity (15%)
* Quality of service (10%)
* Price (5%)

### Terms and Conditions
The terms and conditions of this contract are governed by the Canadian government's procurement regulations.

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Claude Raymond
International Proposals
(343) 000-0000
internationalproposals@international.gc.ca

### Attachments
The Request for Proposal attachment can be accessed at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4667/22-194558---rfp---knsha_1.pdf

### Notice Type
Notice Type: Request for Proposal

### Procurement Method
Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive
